example_en: The children climbed over the large rock by the river.
example_cn: 孩子们爬过了河边的大岩石。
word_family: rocks(n) 岩石 ,rocky(adj) 多岩石的；不稳定的 ,rocking(adj) 摇摆的；极好的
memory_tips: 单词“rock”源自古英语中的“rocc”，其起源尚不明确，但可能与古挪威语中的“rokkr”有关，意思是“纺纱杆”。

image_prompts.main_image: A large, rugged rock formation in a mountainous area, with some greenery around it, under a clear blue sky.
image_prompts.example_image: A group of children climbing over a large, smooth rock near a flowing river, with trees and grass in the background.
